problems.title: Fixing: Not Suctioning on Vertex DuoClean
problems.description: Comprehensive guide to resolving not suctioning issues. If your Vertex DuoClean is acting up, followed these steps.
solution_steps: Turn off and unplug the device.
Inspect the  for visible damage or debris.
Clean all contact points using a dry cloth.
Reset the machine by holding the power button for 10 seconds.
If the issue persists, replace the .

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the not suctioning on a Vertex DuoClean?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement  costs significantly less than a new $390 vacuum. This repair takes about 15 minutes.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Vertex DuoClean  is broken?
faqs.answer: Common signs include loud grinding noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Do I need special tools to replace the Vertex DuoClean ?
faqs.answer: Most repairs only require a Phillips screwdriver and a T8 Torx driver. No soldering or advanced skills needed.
